# set up
library(readr)

## Seasonal Adjustment

* https://github.com/christophsax/seasonal
* https://github.com/angusmoore/seasthedata

## Load data

```{r}
data <- read_csv("~/Documents/Coding Projects/quant_capstone/data_clean/BLS_county_employment_clean.csv") %>%
  select(FIPS, date, Unemployment_Rate) %>%
  group_by(FIPS) %>%
  arrange(FIPS, date)

```


## Adjust data

```{r}

data_seas<- seasthedata(data)

```


## Export data

```{r}

write.csv(data_seas, "~/Documents/Coding Projects/quant_capstone/data_raw/BLS_seas_v1.csv", row.names=FALSE)

```
